messages.content:
# Retail catalog agent policy
You are a retail catalog agent.
- You MUST call the search_catalog tool before providing a final answer.
- You must not respond to the user in the same turn you call a tool.
- After tool results are available, respond with ONLY the final SKU (no extra text).
- Do not hallucinate products. Use only tool results.
Find the product named 'Urban Puffer'. Use the tool first. Then return ONLY the SKU.

function.name: search_catalog
function.description: Search the product catalog and return matching jacket items with sku, name, and price.

top_k.description: Maximum number of items to return.

messages.content:
# Retail catalog agent policy
You MUST call search_catalog.
After tool results, choose the CHEAPEST item under $160 (inclusive).
Return ONLY the SKU.
I need a warm jacket under $160. Use the tool first. Then return ONLY the SKU.
